data.name: Line of Sight - Starters Pack
data.detailed_description:
Starters Pack will get the following items. Every items are permanent except boosters.
BlackSpot Entertainment needs your support to deliver the best FPS online game to Steam community possible.

1. M4A1 with exclusive paint
2. L115A3 with exclusive paint
3. Ellen Wood, a female character.
4. Desert Eagle 50AE
5. Bulls Eye TK-14
6. 10,000 GP
7. 300 Gems ($3 USD cash value)
8. GP Booster (50% for 30 days)
9. EXP Booster (50% for 30 days)



**Notes.
1. A handgun, the female character is holding in the picture below, is not included.

data.short_description: Starters Pack provide several permanent items, and many exclusive items such as weapon skins. Starters Pack is designed to get you start fast and to show our appreciations for supporters who really want to help BlackSpot Entertainment to deliver the best FPS online game to Steam community. Your support will be greatly appreciated.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Korean, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz from Intel or AMD 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.6 from Intel or AMD 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
